One of the noisiest hotels I've ever stayed. This is one of my worst experiences in staying at a hotel in Bali. There was a pool and garden in front of my room, I stayed on the 5th floor which was the highest floor in the hotel. There were back to back night events in the pool area at night, and the noise was crazy, truly crazy, people shouted at night (even at 10-11pm at night). Yes, you read that right. The hotel didn't have any noise policy. If you want a relaxing stay in Bali, PLEASE AVOID THIS HOTEL. It didn't feel like a hotel at all, the noise was like in a music festival, traditional market with people shouting. Although the location is great, but the noise really made this hotel an unpleasant stay. Note that the interior and appliances are outdated as well. 1/5 stars stay experience here. NOISE.
